problem_names:
lemma trm_sound:
  fixes \<theta>::"trm"
  shows "([\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r) \<Longrightarrow> (\<nu> REP \<nu>') \<Longrightarrow>   ([\<theta>]<>\<nu>) \<equiv>\<^sub>P r"

lemma fml_sound:
  fixes \<phi>::"formula" and \<nu>::"wstate"
  shows "(wfsem \<phi> \<nu> b) \<Longrightarrow>  (\<nu> REP \<nu>') \<Longrightarrow> (rfsem \<phi> \<nu>'  b)"

lemma rep_upd:"\<omega> = (\<nu>(Inr x := snd([\<theta>]<>\<nu>)))(Inl x := fst([\<theta>]<>\<nu>))
\<Longrightarrow> \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow> ([\<theta>::trm]\<nu>' \<down> r) \<Longrightarrow> \<omega> REP \<nu>'(x := r)"

theorem interval_program_sound:
  fixes \<alpha>::"prog"
  shows "([[\<alpha>]] \<nu> \<down> \<omega>)  \<Longrightarrow> \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow> (\<exists>\<omega>'. (\<omega> REP \<omega>') \<and> ([\<alpha>] \<nu>' \<downharpoonleft> \<omega>'))"
translations: lemmas real_max_mono =  Lattices.linorder_class.max.mono
lemmas real_minus_le_minus = Groups.ordered_ab_group_add_class.neg_le_iff_le
text\<open>Interval state consists of upper and lower bounds for each real variable\<close>

inductive represents_state::"wstate \<Rightarrow> rstate \<Rightarrow> bool" (infix "REP" 10)
where REPI:"(\<And>x. (\<nu> (Inl x) \<equiv>\<^sub>L \<nu>' x) \<and> (\<nu> (Inr x) \<equiv>\<^sub>U \<nu>' x)) \<Longrightarrow> (\<nu> REP \<nu>')"
inductive_simps repstate_simps:"\<nu> REP \<nu>'"
section\<open>Soundness proofs\<close>
text\<open>Interval term valuation soundly contains real valuation\<close>

lemma trm_sound:
  fixes \<theta>::"trm"
  shows "([\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r) \<Longrightarrow> (\<nu> REP \<nu>') \<Longrightarrow>   ([\<theta>]<>\<nu>) \<equiv>\<^sub>P r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>[\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r; \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [\<theta>]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r
proof (induction rule: rtsem.induct)
case rtsem_Const

proof (state)
this:
  Rep_bword w_ \<equiv>\<^sub>E r_
  \<nu> REP \<nu>_

goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<And>w r \<nu>'.
       \<lbrakk>Rep_bword w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r; \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Const w]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r
 2. \<And>x \<nu>'.
       \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
       [Var x]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P \<nu>' x
 3. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Plus \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         r1 + r2
 4. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Times \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         r1 * r2
 5. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [trm.Max \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         max r1 r2
 6. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [trm.Min \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         min r1 r2
 7. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Abs \<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         \<bar>r1\<bar>
 8. \<And>\<theta> \<nu>' r.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Neg \<theta>]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P - r
fix w r \<nu>'
show "Rep_bword w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r \<Longrightarrow> \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow> [Const w]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Rep_bword w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r; \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [Const w]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r
using repU_def repL_def repP_def repe.simps rep_simps repstate_simps

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?w \<equiv>\<^sub>U ?r \<equiv> \<exists>r'\<ge>?r. ?w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r'
  ?w \<equiv>\<^sub>L ?r \<equiv> \<exists>r'\<le>?r. ?w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r'
  ?w \<equiv>\<^sub>P ?r \<equiv>
  let (w1, w2) = ?w
  in (w1 \<equiv>\<^sub>L ?r) \<and> (w2 \<equiv>\<^sub>U ?r)
  (?a1.0 \<equiv>\<^sub>E ?a2.0) =
  ((\<exists>r.
       ?a1.0 = POS_INF \<and>
       ?a2.0 = r \<and> real_of_int (sint POS_INF) \<le> r) \<or>
   (\<exists>r.
       ?a1.0 = NEG_INF \<and>
       ?a2.0 = r \<and> r \<le> real_of_int (sint NEG_INF)) \<or>
   (\<exists>w.
       ?a1.0 = w \<and>
       ?a2.0 = real_of_int (sint w) \<and>
       real_of_int (sint w) < real_of_int (sint POS_INF) \<and>
       real_of_int (sint NEG_INF) < real_of_int (sint w)))
  (POS_INF \<equiv>\<^sub>E ?r) = (2147483647 \<le> ?r)
  (NEG_INF \<equiv>\<^sub>E ?r) = (?r \<le> - 2147483647)
  (?w \<equiv>\<^sub>E real_of_int (sint ?w)) =
  (?w = 0x7FFFFFFF \<and> 2147483647 \<le> signed_real_of_word ?w \<or>
   ?w = 0x80000001 \<and> signed_real_of_word ?w \<le> - 2147483647 \<or>
   sint ?w < 2147483647 \<and> - 2147483647 < sint ?w)
  (?\<nu> REP ?\<nu>') =
  (\<forall>x.
      (?\<nu> (Inl x) \<equiv>\<^sub>L ?\<nu>' x) \<and>
      (?\<nu> (Inr x) \<equiv>\<^sub>U ?\<nu>' x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Rep_bword w \<equiv>\<^sub>E r; \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> [Const w]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r
by auto

goal (1 subgoal):

proof (state)
this:

  \<nu> REP \<nu>_ \<Longrightarrow>
  [\<theta>\<^sub>2_]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2_

goal (6 subgoals):
 1. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Plus \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         r1 + r2
 2. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Times \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         r1 * r2
 3. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [trm.Max \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         max r1 r2
 4. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1 \<theta>\<^sub>2 r2.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]\<nu>' \<down> r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r2;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [trm.Min \<theta>\<^sub>1
                           \<theta>\<^sub>2]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         min r1 r2
 5. \<And>\<theta>\<^sub>1 \<nu>' r1.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>\<^sub>1]\<nu>' \<down> r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r1;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Abs \<theta>\<^sub>1]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P
                         \<bar>r1\<bar>
 6. \<And>\<theta> \<nu>' r.
       \<lbrakk>[\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow>
        [\<theta>]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P r;
        \<nu> REP \<nu>'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> [Neg \<theta>]<>\<nu> \<equiv>\<^sub>P - r

text\<open>Every term has a value\<close>
lemma eval_tot:"(\<exists>r. ([\<theta>::trm]\<nu>' \<down> r))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>r. [\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r
proof (induction "\<theta>")

proof (state)
goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x. \<exists>r. [Var x]\<nu>' \<down> r
 2. \<And>x. \<exists>r. [Const x]\<nu>' \<down> r
 3. \<And>\<theta>1 \<theta>2.
       \<lbrakk>\<exists>r. [\<theta>1]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<exists>r. [\<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>r.
                            [Plus \<theta>1 \<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r
 4. \<And>\<theta>1 \<theta>2.
       \<lbrakk>\<exists>r. [\<theta>1]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<exists>r. [\<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>r.
                            [Times \<theta>1 \<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r
 5. \<And>\<theta>.
       \<exists>r. [\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>r. [Neg \<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r
 6. \<And>\<theta>1 \<theta>2.
       \<lbrakk>\<exists>r. [\<theta>1]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<exists>r. [\<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>r.
                            [trm.Max \<theta>1 \<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r
 7. \<And>\<theta>1 \<theta>2.
       \<lbrakk>\<exists>r. [\<theta>1]\<nu>' \<down> r;
        \<exists>r. [\<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>r.
                            [trm.Min \<theta>1 \<theta>2]\<nu>' \<down> r
 8. \<And>\<theta>.
       \<exists>r. [\<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>r. [Abs \<theta>]\<nu>' \<down> r
qed (auto simp add: Min_def word_rep bword_neg_one_def, blast?)

text\<open>Interval program semantics soundly contains real semantics existentially\<close>

theorem interval_program_sound:
  fixes \<alpha>::"prog"
  shows "([[\<alpha>]] \<nu> \<down> \<omega>)  \<Longrightarrow> \<nu> REP \<nu>' \<Longrightarrow> (\<exists>\<omega>'. (\<omega> REP \<omega>') \<and> ([\<alpha>] \<nu>' \<downharpoonleft> \<omega>'))"

                         ([\<alpha>]\<nu>' \<downharpoonleft> \<omega>')
